import_export_modal.db_storage: The recommended way to save a calculator. The calculator can be saved with or without publishing it to customer app. Alternatively one can also publish it as WIP. WIP calculators are only accessible through the /dev route of the app. These are meant for testing only.
import_export_modal.local_storage: The browser storage only have capacity for one calculator, and should only be used temporarily

import_export_modal.cannot_save_empty: Cannot save empty graph to database
import_export_modal.cannot_save_no_name_or_version: Cannot save a calculator without a name and version
import_export_modal.invalid_auth_token: Invalid authentication token, try logging in and out again
import_export_modal.error_auth_token_retrieval: Error getting authentication token, try logging in and out again
